feature1.explanation: Both texts use similar punctuation marks such as hyphens, brackets, colons, and quotation marks. Commas are used in a similar style as well.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit similarities in lexical choice and word usage. They share common grammatical features and part of speech usage.

feature3.explanation: In terms of sentence structure, both texts show coherence and cohesion. They have comparable sentence complexity and length.

feature4.explanation: Both texts share similarities in their narrative styles and tone. There are common expressions and idioms used in both texts.

feature5.explanation: There are no spelling or typographical errors observed in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the analysis of all features, there is a high likelihood that the two texts were written by the same author.
